name: Bulle Souffle
effect:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. Pour the beaten egg whites into a Bulle Fruit skin that has been scraped empty, and bake it until the souffle has evenly expanded. The word "Bulle" isn't a part of the name just because it's in the ingredient list, but because the finished product allows the tongue to delight in bubble-like spongy softness.

suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. You could not resist sneaking a peek as this baked, only to see the expanding souffle collapse speedily... It seems that curiosity not only kills cats, but ruins cakes too.

normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. Pour the beaten egg whites into a Bulle Fruit skin that has been scraped empty, and bake it until the souffle has evenly expanded. The word "Bulle" isn't a part of the name just because it's in the ingredient list, but because the finished product allows the tongue to delight in bubble-like spongy softness.

delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. It all starts with that glorious, fluffy mouthfeel. Then comes the rich eggy aroma and fruity-fresh flavor suffusing your mouth, as if you had plunged headfirst into pillowy clouds, such that the very air sings with subtle sweetness.
